structure.unit: A KENTUCKY UNIFORM UNINCORPORATED NONPROFIT ASSOCIATION ACT

law.catch_line: Distribution prohibited -- Compensation and other permitted payments.

text.section: Except as otherwise provided in subsection (2) of this section, an unincorporated nonprofit association shall not pay dividends or make distributions to a member or manager.

law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 34, effective June 24, 2015.
